export const sendNotification = defineCommand({
  meta: {
    name: "SendNotification",
    version: "1.0.0",
    stability: "Beta",
  },
  io: {
    input: z.object({
      userId: z.string().uuid(),
      channel: z.enum(["push", "email", "sms"]),
      title: z.string(),
      body: z.string(),
    }),
    output: z.object({
      notificationId: z.string().uuid(),
      deliveredAt: z.date().nullable(),

});
